name: Russian & Turkish Baths
description: Quintessential New York sauna. Old and grimey adds a bit to the charm. The cold plunge is over-chlorinated to the point of being unusable.

name: Paradise Sauna
description: Saunachelin award winner for 2022. Idyllic interior. One of the top recommendations for Tokyo saunas. Female days on the 10th, 20th, 30th of each month. Male only other days.

name: BATHHOUSE
description: True to overproductionized Williamsburg. Hilarious Aufguss experiences served daily represents the commoditization of wellness culture. Owned and run by a known Brooklyn grifter, so patronize at your discretion. Reasonably functional sauna and cold plunge.

name: Löyly Helsinki
description: Helsinki's premier sauna experience.

name: Bota Bota, spa-sur-l'eau
description: On an immobile boat.

name: ROOFTOP Sauna
description: Bathtub cold plunges on a roof, of varying temperature. Experience sunset totonou at this one-of-a-kind sauna. Coworking space on the floor below.

name: Archimedes Banya
description: The San Francisco option.

name: MONSTER WORK & SAUNA
description: By the ROOFTOP Sauna team. Largest sauna room in Tokyo. Multiple seat tiers. A large cold plunge that cools to 10C on one end and 20C on another yielding a temperature gradient.

name: SKY SPA Yokohama
description: Saunachelin winner. Skyline view. Multiple sauna rooms. Dedicated co-ed sauna on the upper floor with adjacent ice rooms. Hosts many aufguss championships.

name: Wellbe Sakae
description: Saunachelin winner. Many distinct sauna rooms. A nice cold plunge inside an ice room.

name: COCOFURO かが浴場
description: Highly recommended, off-the-tourist path sento. Popular among locals. Renovated and modernized. Every 30 minutes, a light show and music accompany an auto-loyly. Setlists change daily, mostly J-pop.

name: Koganeyu
description: Modernized and renovated sento, originally founded in 1932. Popular among locals. Famous for its beer bar.

name: 8HOTEL CHIGASAKI
description: Hip hotel with a Saunachelin-winning co-ed sauna. At evening, the hotel pool is set to cold for a plunge you can dive into.

name: ８HOTEL SHONAN FUJISAWA
description: Hotel with a photogenic co-ed spa called 8 WATER CAVE.

name: King Spa & Sauna
description: You don't need a hotel in NYC, just take the bus here and spend the night.

name: Personal Sauna KUU
description: A perfected personal sauna.

name: SHIBUYA SAUNAS
description: Five distinct sauna rooms; variations on the sauna theme. Two cold plunges. Half indoor, half outdoor. A lot of thought went into the design here. Saunachelin winner. One of the top recommendations in Tokyo.

name: Kinnokame
description: A.k.a. Kinnokame, a delightful turtle and ginger-themed sauna in Akasaka. Cold plunge is infused with ginger. Loyly is infused with ginger essential oils. Free ginger sugar tablets and ginger water.

name: AIRE Ancient Baths New York
description: Pretend you're in ancient Rome. Overpriced, but two cold plunge levels make it worth the visit.

name: SoJo Spa Club
description: Instagrammable spot that people might enjoy visiting on occasion, but too posh for many.

name: Wall Street Bath & Spa 88
description: A Russian bathhouse in the Financial District. Arguably better than the Russian & Turkish Baths, if not only for the healther chlorine levels in the deep plunge.

name: Vabali
description: Berlin's top sauna destination. Sprawling spa with high-frequency aufguss across multiple rooms. A single one-person cold plunge.
